Topic.Title: Jack Ma holds the future of Yahoo in his hands

Message.Msg: Jack Ma is a crook but backing out of this deal would not destroy YHOO as it is already trading below its asset value. Unless China gets very weak the price Ma is getting the 20% for is a good deal for him and at least not a total rip off of YHOO. The worry is Ma is having trouble getting the money due not to AG but over all market condditions. Ma would have been smart to do his AG IPO about a year ago instead of waiting for China to slow down, but he was greedy and wanted to screw YHOO. Yet YHOO's value in AG is still not reflected in YHOO share price.

Topic.Title: Marissa Mayer inexperienced as CEO

Message.Msg: I feel the new CEO Marissa Mayer is very unprofessional & unethical because she openly has started pulling Google employees to come work for Yahoo. Given she worked there just a month ago and that both companies compete directly isn't this consider wrong? All Google employees coming knows exactly what Google did, is doing or will be doing going forward. I can understand if MM attracts talent from other places due to her contacts but inviting Google folks sounds too unethical and unprofessional to me. Also she is totally inexperienced to be CEO as she has never ever been one in her life. If Carl Icahn and others can't make this stock rise in last 5 yrs despite several seasoned CEO's like Carol Bartz, Terry Semel, etc I don't know how much Marissa Mayer would be able to do given her lack of finance & business operations knowledge imho. Do you guys agree?

Message.Title: Why Doesn't YHOO Report on This???
Message.Msg: “When the Democratic Party refuses to provide child care at the convention and denies automatic access for young children to join their moms who serve as delegates on the convention floor, an entire group of women are disenfranchised,” said Shannon. “Moms with young children 6 years of age and under who cannot be left at home, some of whom are breast-feeding, are relegated to second-class status within the Democratic convention. YHOO doesn't report it, because it doesn't fit in with their "PRO OBAMA AND THE DEMOCRATIC PARTY, AT ALL COSTS" AGENDA. Part of the cost is alienating users and driving them away forever.
